create_or_update_contact.description: Create or update an existing contact

props.name: email
props.description: Email address of the user. Mandatory if "SMS" field is not passed in "attributes" parameter. Mobile Number in SMS field should be passed with proper country code. For example: {"SMS":"+91xxxxxxxxxx"} or {"SMS":"0091xxxxxxxxxx"}

props.name: ext_id
props.description: Pass your own Id to create a contact.

props.name: attributes
props.description:
Pass the set of attributes and their values. The attribute's parameter should be passed in capital letter while creating a contact. These attributes must be present in your SendinBlue account. For eg:
        {"FNAME":"Elly", "LNAME":"Roger"}

props.name: email_blacklisted
props.description: Set this field to blacklist the contact for emails (emailBlacklisted = true)

props.name: sms_blacklisted
props.description: Set this field to blacklist the contact for SMS (smsBlacklisted = true)

props.name: list_ids
props.description: Ids of the lists to add the contact to.

props.name: smtp_blacklist_sender
props.description: transactional email forbidden sender for contact. Use only for email Contact ( only available if updateEnabled = true )
